original: @ga @#/_/'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung
analyzed: @ga @#/_/'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung

original: grub pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: grub pa zhes bya ba/

analyzed: ba'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma dri med steng na lhun po la zla ba rnam par gnas/_/khams

analyzed: bcug cing dag pa de la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dam pa rnams kyi ye shes gso ba'i phyir/_/
translated: In order to revive the wisdom of the sublime ones,

analyzed: 'dis/_/ye shes rnam par skyed nas ni/_/chags bral rnams kyis dga'
translated: should delight in being free from attachment.🔽Those who do not understand the supreme meaning

analyzed: bar gyis/_/ngas ni rnam par bshad pa la/_/mchog gi don mi shes pa rnams ni

analyzed: sun 'byin byed/_/rgyud sde 'o ma dag ni bsrub pa las/_/snying po mar ni man ngag

analyzed: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The commentary on the attainment of immortality called the Siddha of the Swastika🔽is churned from the milk of the tantras.🔽The essence, the butter, is the upadeshas.

analyzed: 'di rnam par phyung /_/log pa'i lam nas rmongs pa rnams/_/bstan bcos ma
translated: Those who are confused on the wrong path🔽know all the treatises,

analyzed: lus kun shes kyang /_/'khrul pas sa steng thams cad 'khyams/_/de ni ye
translated: but wander everywhere on the surface of the earth through delusion.🔽When they find this profound path of wisdom,🔽like the sun rising on the dew,

analyzed: shes lam zab mo 'di rnyed pas/_/zil pa la ni nyi shar bzhin/_/bla ma yi ni zhal

analyzed: dag las/_/man ngag mchog gi dam pa 'di rnyed do/_/rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang

analyzed: ba'i don/_/de ni rim gyis bshad par bya/_/lus kyi nang gi snying po rnams/_/
translated: The essences within the body🔽arise as many faults.🔽Those should be removed

analyzed: nyes pa rnam pa du mar shar/_/de dang de ni rnam bsal bya/_/ji ltar gnas
translated: and explained according to the mode of being.🔽The body, the central nāḍī, the moon,

analyzed: lugs bzhin du bstan/_/lus dang dbu ma dag dang ni/_/zla ba nyi ma me
translated: the sun, the fire,

analyzed: rnams dang /_/chu dang thig le'i de nyid dang /_/sems kyi rang bzhin gang

analyzed: yin pa/_/bdag nyid kyis ni bshad par bya/_/rtsha sgo bsdam pa che dang phyag rgya che//

analyzed: dbye dang goms pas sgrub pa'o/_/gnas pa yis ni 'chi ba med/_/gnyis su
translated: By abiding, there is immortality.🔽The stable, nondual mind is delightful.

analyzed: med pa'i bsam brtan dga'/_/grub pa chen po rnam par shar/_/tha mal pa'i
translated: The great siddhi arises.🔽The ordinary great elements cease.

analyzed: 'byung ba che rnams yongs su 'gags/_/phyag rgya chen po mngon par rnyed/_/

analyzed: gnas pa chen po rgyu dus su/_/rnam pa du ma bshad pa las/_/'ga' zhig gis
translated: From the many explanations at the time of the cause,🔽some will understand.

analyzed: ni shes par 'gyur/_/snying po lus kyi de nyid bsdus nas ni/_/bdag nyid kyis

analyzed: ni bshad par bya/_/lus la mgo bo lhun po'i rnam par cha gsum du gnas/_/gling

analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi rnams dag ni kun dang ldan/_/sa 'og sa steng sa bla'i 'jig rten gsum yang

analyzed: de na gnas/_/sprul pa sa ni yan lag bdun bdun bcu bzhir yang dag ldan/_/rgya mtshho

original: skar dag dang ldan/_/drang srong thub pa rnams kyang gnas/_/skye dang mi rtag
analyzed: skar dag dang ldan/_/drang srong thub pa rnams kyang gnas/_/skye dang mi rtag
translated: Birth and impermanence

original: du gnas shing /_/nyi ma zla ba rnam par rgyu/_/rlung dang nam mkha' me dang ni/_/
analyzed: du gnas shing /_/nyi ma zla ba rnam par rgyu/_/rlung dang nam mkha' me dang ni/_/
translated: The sun, moon, and stars move, and the wind, space, fire,🔽earth, and water are present.

analyzed: sa dang chu yang rnam par gnas/_/sdig pa spangs pa'i b+hi lkug khyab /_/
translated: The pervader of the world, free of sin,🔽Brahma and Mahesvara abide.

analyzed: dang / tshhangs dang dbang phyug chen po gnas/_/khams gsum kun kyang nges par ni/_/

analyzed: thams cad ma lus lus la gnas/_/lus kyi de nyid shes pa yis/_/de nyid
translated: By knowing the reality of the body,🔽all realities are present in the body.

analyzed: thams cad lus la gnas/_/bsod nams chen po'i bgo skal gyis/_/mi'i
translated: By the share of great merit,🔽the human body is definitely obtained.

original: gshegs rigs 'gyur/_/gang gis 'khor ba'i skyon rnams ni/_/nges par zad
analyzed: gshegs rigs 'gyur/_/gang gis 'khor ba'i skyon rnams ni/_/nges par zad
translated: By whom the faults of samsara🔽are definitely exhausted.🔽From the Accomplishment of the Immutable:

analyzed: par 'gyur ba yin/_/g.yung drung grub pa las/_lus kyi dben pa'o//_//

analyzed: lhun po rnam par 'khyam pa yis/_/'gro ba kun la khyab pa yin/_/
translated: The mountain of the navel pervades all beings.🔽Having entered the path of the middle, incomparable one,

analyzed: dbus ma dpe med lam zhugs nas/_/lhun po rnam par phug nas gnas/_/
translated: it abides, having pierced the mountain.🔽Merit abides in two ways,

analyzed: bsod nams sgo ni gnyis su gnas/_/steng dang 'og gi cha ru gnas/_/'og

analyzed: gi sgo ru zhugs pa yis/_/skye dang mi rtag rang bzhin no/_/bsod nams ye

analyzed: shes ldan pa dang /_/brtshon 'grus stobs dang rab ldan pas/_/gzung 'dzin

analyzed: nyams pa'i lam nas zhugs nas ni/_/rnam grol lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/
translated: one will proceed on the path of liberation.🔽This is the great knowledge of the goddess,

analyzed: 'di ni lha mo rig pa che/_/lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/_/'gro ba kun

analyzed: gyi ma yin no/_/'chi ba nges par zad par byed/_/de ni skye ba'i gnas na

analyzed: gnas/_/lha mo kun la stobs mo che/_/sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mgo//

analyzed: grol ba'i lam du rnam par gnas/_/kha cig a ba d+hu ti zer/_/kha cig dur

analyzed: khrod zhes kyang zer/_/su so phra na phra gzugs zer/_/dbyangs can zhes kyang

analyzed: rnam par 'dogs/_/sna tshhogs du ma'i dbye ba yis/_/ye shes spyan can rnams

analyzed: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The Commentary on the Attainment of Immortality Called “Svastika Attainment”

analyzed: kyis btags/_/'di yi ming la brten nas su/_/lus ni rten par 'gyur ba
translated: The body is supported by this name.🔽In the middle between the two, right and left,

original: yin/_/g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi dbus su ni/_/bde chen gcig pu 'bab
analyzed: yin/_/g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi dbus su ni/_/bde chen gcig pu 'bab
translated: the sole great bliss descends.🔽The person who has become the sole one of the three

analyzed: par 'gyur/_/gsum po gcig pu gyur pa yis/_/skyes bu de ni mchog tu 'gyur//

translated: This is the section on the divisions of the rasana and the lalana in the Attainment of the Immortal Amṛta.🔽The moon abides on the peak of Meru.🔽When the two are joined at the right and left times,🔽the rain of purity falls below

analyzed: ldan na/_/nyin mo dang ni mtshhan dag tu/_/dag pa'i char pa 'og tu 'bab/_/

analyzed: de nas bdud de gnyis su byung /_/de nyid rig pa'i mis shes bya/_/g.yon gyi
translated: and the person who knows reality should know them.🔽The one that flows into the left🔽path, and the one that is dispersed by the fire

original: lam du 'bab pa dang /_/me yis me bskyod rnam par bzhus/_/phra ba'i lam
analyzed: lam du 'bab pa dang /_/me yis me bskyod rnam par bzhus/_/phra ba'i lam

analyzed: du song nas ni/_/lus rnams kun la khyab pa yin/_/des na zla ba'i rang
translated: Therefore, it is the nature of the moon.🔽It abides in the left path.

analyzed: bzhin no/_/g.yon gyi lam du rnam par gnas/_/dbang po gnyis sbyor dus su
translated: At the time of the union of the two organs,🔽the moon mandala enters.

original: ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jug_/dbu ma'i lam nas zhugs
analyzed: ni/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'jug_/dbu ma'i lam nas zhugs
translated: Having entered through the central path,🔽it goes to the door of birth.

original: nas ni/_/skye ba'i sgo ru 'gro bar 'gyur/_/g.yung drung grub pa las/_zla
analyzed: nas ni/_/skye ba'i sgo ru 'gro bar 'gyur/_/g.yung drung grub pa las/_zla
translated: In the Accomplishment of Atikūṭa,🔽it is said, “The moon is in the middle.🔽It abides in the middle of the rasanā.

original: ba'i dben pa'o// dbus ma'i rtsha bar rab tu gnas/_/de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/
analyzed: ba'i dben pa'o// dbus ma'i rtsha bar rab tu gnas/_/de ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/
translated: That is the sun mandala.🔽The time is the perfect twelve.

original: dus ni bcu gnyis yang dag rdzogs/_/mar me'i gsal ba lta bu'am/_/g.yas
analyzed: dus ni bcu gnyis yang dag rdzogs/_/mar me'i gsal ba lta bu'am/_/g.yas
translated: Like the flame of a lamp,🔽it blazes intensely to the right and above.🔽The nature of sharpness is the lord of all.

original: phyogs steng du drag tu 'phyur/_/rnon po'i rang bzhin kun gyi bdag_/lus
analyzed: phyogs steng du drag tu 'phyur/_/rnon po'i rang bzhin kun gyi bdag_/lus
translated: The nature of the body

original: rnams kun la ma lus khyab/_/rtsha ba'i lam zhugs nam mkhar 'gro/_/rlung gi
analyzed: rnams kun la ma lus khyab/_/rtsha ba'i lam zhugs nam mkhar 'gro/_/rlung gi
translated: It moves in the sky, the path of heat.🔽It is the mandala of wind that moves.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor ba yin/_/khams bdun sreg par byed pa dang /_/lus
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor ba yin/_/khams bdun sreg par byed pa dang /_/lus
translated: It burns the seven elements🔽and burns the entire body.

original: kun sreg par byed pa nyid/_/de ni nyi ma'i rang bzhin no/_/gang gis sbyor
analyzed: kun sreg par byed pa nyid/_/de ni nyi ma'i rang bzhin no/_/gang gis sbyor
translated: That is the nature of the sun.🔽It moves at the time of union

original: ba'i dus su rgyu/_/skye 'gag gnyis kyi rgyu yin no/_/g.yas su 'gro ba spangs pa
analyzed: ba'i dus su rgyu/_/skye 'gag gnyis kyi rgyu yin no/_/g.yas su 'gro ba spangs pa
translated: and is the cause of both arising and ceasing.🔽Since the sun moves to the right

analyzed: ni/_/nyi ma lhun po la gnas pas/_/sems ni rnam par dben pa'o/_/lus
translated: and abides on the mountain, the mind is isolated.🔽The body is the time of merit.

original: ni bsod nams dus yin no/_/rnam spangs lus kyi nang du shes/_/rang gis
analyzed: ni bsod nams dus yin no/_/rnam spangs lus kyi nang du shes/_/rang gis
translated: The body is abandoned and known internally.🔽One should become familiar with that.🔽At the time of the central nāḍī,

original: goms par byas pa yin/_/dbu ma'i dus su sbyor ba'i tshhe/_/rnal 'byor bde
analyzed: goms par byas pa yin/_/dbu ma'i dus su sbyor ba'i tshhe/_/rnal 'byor bde
translated: the yogī should perform the practice of great bliss.🔽In every instant,

original: chen bya ba yin/_/de'i skad cig skad cig la/_/skye dang 'gag pa'i dus kun
analyzed: chen bya ba yin/_/de'i skad cig skad cig la/_/skye dang 'gag pa'i dus kun

analyzed: tu/_/nyi ma'i rang bzhin 'byung ba yin/_/nyi zla gcig tu bsdam par bya/_/

analyzed: sbyor ba gcig tu gyur pa yin/_/phyi rol skye ba shes par bya/_/sbyor ba ngan pa

analyzed: byung ba'o/_/'dzin pa dben par shes par bya/_/phyi rol nang du shes par

analyzed: bsdus/_/phyi rol skye ba bsod nams so/_/nang du rnam par grol bar bshad//

original: zla ba nyi mas yongs bzung tshhe/_/gcig nyid du ni 'gyur ba'i dus/_/gzhan
analyzed: zla ba nyi mas yongs bzung tshhe/_/gcig nyid du ni 'gyur ba'i dus/_/gzhan

original: du gzhan du sbyor ba'o/_/de ni sbyor ba yang dag bshad/_/nyi ma me dang ra hu
analyzed: du gzhan du sbyor ba'o/_/de ni sbyor ba yang dag bshad/_/nyi ma me dang ra hu

original: dang /_/de rnams steng du 'gro ba'i tshhe/_/bdud nyi zla ba 'og tu 'bab/_/de
analyzed: dang /_/de rnams steng du 'gro ba'i tshhe/_/bdud nyi zla ba 'og tu 'bab/_/de
translated: The demon sun and moon fall below.🔽Then that will be destroyed.🔽Then all without exception

original: ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur/_/de nas ma lus thams cad kyang /_/steng du🔽rnam par 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/nyi zla dag ni mnyam pa dang /_/'dis ni grol ba
analyzed: ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur/_/de nas ma lus thams cad kyang /_/steng du rnam par 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/nyi zla dag ni mnyam pa dang /_/'dis ni grol ba
translated: will go above.🔽The sun and moon are equal, and by this,🔽it is explained as liberation.🔽From the Accomplishment of Immortality:

original: zhes bshad do/_/'chi med grub pa las/_nyi ma'i dben pa'o//_//
analyzed: zhes bshad do/_/'chi med grub pa las/_nyi ma'i dben pa'o//_//
translated: The isolation of the sun.

original: dus ni bcu gnyis dag dang ldan/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/
analyzed: dus ni bcu gnyis dag dang ldan/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/
translated: in the middle of the maṇḍala of the sun.🔽Day and night are there,🔽and the jewel is ripened by fire.

original: nyin dang mtshhan du de na gnas/_/rin chen mes ni smin par byed/_/me de
analyzed: nyin dang mtshhan du de na gnas/_/rin chen mes ni smin par byed/_/me de
translated: That fire🔽is the sun, and that which is the sun is also fire.

original: gang yin nyi ma yin/_/nyi ma gang yin me 'ang yin/_/gcig tu rnam par blta🔽bar bya/_/phra ba'i dbye bas phye bas so/_/ji srid nyi ma'i dbus su ni/_/me
analyzed: gang yin nyi ma yin/_/nyi ma gang yin me 'ang yin/_/gcig tu rnam par blta bar bya/_/phra ba'i dbye bas phye bas so/_/ji srid nyi ma'i dbus su ni/_/me
translated: One should view them as one,🔽because they are differentiated by subtle divisions.🔽As long as the fire🔽is present in the middle of the sun,

original: ni rnam par gnas bar du/_/de srid thig le rnam par 'phel/_/thig le
analyzed: ni rnam par gnas bar du/_/de srid thig le rnam par 'phel/_/thig le
translated: the bindu increases.

original: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The Commentary on the Attainment of Immortality called “Accomplishing the Swastika”🔽The incomparable one without a hole

original: mnyam med bug pa med/_/me yis 'dzin stobs skyed par byed/_/de yi tshhe
analyzed: mnyam med bug pa med/_/me yis 'dzin stobs skyed par byed/_/de yi tshhe
translated: generates the power of the fire’s retention,🔽and also increases its heat.🔽That is the stabilization.

original: yang 'phel bar byed/_/de ni brtan par byed pa yin/_/bdud rtshi grub pa las/
analyzed: yang 'phel bar byed/_/de ni brtan par byed pa yin/_/bdud rtshi grub pa las/
translated: From the Attainment of Mercury:🔽The isolation of fire🔽All migrating beings arise from vāyu,

original: me'i dben pa'o//_// 'gro ba thams cad rlung las byung /_/ye shes lus kyang de bzhin no/_/
analyzed: me'i dben pa'o//_// 'gro ba thams cad rlung las byung /_/ye shes lus kyang de bzhin no/_/
translated: and the jñānakāya is also like that.

original: de nyid kun gyi snying por byung /_/mgon po rlung la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/yang dag
analyzed: de nyid kun gyi snying por byung /_/mgon po rlung la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/yang dag
translated: Homage to the protector Vayu.

original: de yi bka' drin gyis/_/'gro ba rnams ni rnam par skyong /_/sa las sogs pa
analyzed: de yi bka' drin gyis/_/'gro ba rnams ni rnam par skyong /_/sa las sogs pa
translated: By his kindness, beings are sustained.🔽The four, earth and so forth,🔽are held individually.🔽The entire world, the oceans,

original: bzhi po ni/_/so so ru ni bzung ba'o/_/'jig rten kun dang rgya mtshho dang /_/ sa rnams kun ni ma lus dang /_/de rnams kun ni ma lus gnas/_/thams
analyzed: bzhi po ni/_/so so ru ni bzung ba'o/_/'jig rten kun dang rgya mtshho dang /_/ sa rnams kun ni ma lus dang /_/de rnams kun ni ma lus gnas/_/thams
translated: and all the lands without exception🔽are pervaded by him,

original: cad la ni khyab pa'o/_/'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par 'khyam/_/gza' las
analyzed: cad la ni khyab pa'o/_/'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par 'khyam/_/gza' las
translated: who resides in all of them without exception.🔽The seven sages, Vayu and so forth,

original: sogs pa thub pa bdun/_/khams gsum po ni de yis bzung /_/rlung ni chen🔽po gcig pu ste/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor
analyzed: sogs pa thub pa bdun/_/khams gsum po ni de yis bzung /_/rlung ni chen po gcig pu ste/_/phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ni/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor
translated: hold the three realms.🔽The great wind is the only one🔽in the outer maṇḍala cakra.🔽The great maṇḍala of wind

original: che ba ste/_/de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rlung ni gcig pu mnga'
analyzed: che ba ste/_/de bzhin lus kyi dkyil 'khor du/_/rlung ni gcig pu mnga'
translated: is the only lord of the maṇḍala of the body.

original: bdag yin/_/sna tshhogs bol ting 'theb 'dzub rje ngar pus mo brla phongs chu lam ste snying rke mgrin lce sna mig
analyzed: bdag yin/_/sna tshhogs bol ting 'theb 'dzub rje ngar pus mo brla phongs chu lam ste snying rke mgrin lce sna mig
translated: The nose, the uvula, the fingers, the toes, the knees, the thighs, the buttocks, the urinary tract, the heart, the throat, the neck, the tongue, the nose, the eyes,

original: dpral mgo gnas su rlung rnams 'gro/_/sna tshhogs don rnams 'grub par byed/_/
analyzed: dpral mgo gnas su rlung rnams 'gro/_/sna tshhogs don rnams 'grub par byed/_/
translated: The winds that go to the place of the head of the forehead🔽accomplish various aims.

original: lus kyi de nyid grub par byed/_/lus kyi de nyid ci yod pa/_/rlung ni gcig
analyzed: lus kyi de nyid grub par byed/_/lus kyi de nyid ci yod pa/_/rlung ni gcig
translated: The winds that go to the place of the heart🔽are said to be the winds that sustain life.

original: pur bshad par bya/_/snying du srog 'dzin gnas pa'o/_/gsang ba'i gnas su
analyzed: pur bshad par bya/_/snying du srog 'dzin gnas pa'o/_/gsang ba'i gnas su
translated: The winds that go to the place of the secret🔽are the day winds.🔽The fire is located at the navel.

original: nyin rlung gnas/_/me ni lte bar gnas pa yin/_/steng rlung mgrin par gnas
analyzed: nyin rlung gnas/_/me ni lte bar gnas pa yin/_/steng rlung mgrin par gnas
translated: The upper winds are located in the throat.

original: pa'o/_/lus kun la ni khyab byed gnas/_/g.yung drung grub pa las/_rlung
analyzed: pa'o/_/lus kun la ni khyab byed gnas/_/g.yung drung grub pa las/_rlung
translated: The pervading winds are located throughout the body.

original: gi dben pa'o/_/ e de bas 'gyur gyi tshhe lo rgyus 'thud pa yin gsung ngo 'bir ba pas mdzad 'chi med gzhung //
analyzed: gi dben pa'o/_/ e de bas 'gyur gyi tshhe lo rgyus 'thud pa yin gsung ngo 'bir ba pas mdzad 'chi med gzhung //
translated: The story continues in the Ekaśṛṅga Tantra.🔽Since the black brahman did not know,

original: bram ze nag pos ma mkhyen nas/_/nyid kyi sku lus rdor byin brlabs/_/de
analyzed: bram ze nag pos ma mkhyen nas/_/nyid kyi sku lus rdor byin brlabs/_/de
translated: he blessed his body to be a stone.🔽In front of it, he made a gaṇacakra offering and supplicated,

original: drung tshhogs mchod gsol btab tshhe/_/chang khal lnga bcu rdo zhal gsol/_/de
analyzed: drung tshhogs mchod gsol btab tshhe/_/chang khal lnga bcu rdo zhal gsol/_/de
translated: and he ate fifty loads of beer with a stone face.

original: rjes bzi nas 'grel 'di gsungs/_/de nas de yis 'grel mdzad gang /_/
analyzed: rjes bzi nas 'grel 'di gsungs/_/de nas de yis 'grel mdzad gang /_/
translated: After that, he became drunk and spoke this commentary.

original: bram zes rdo rje'i tshhig rkang mdzad//_//
analyzed: bram zes rdo rje'i tshhig rkang mdzad//_//
translated: The Brahmin composed the Vajra Lines.🔽In the land of the Ghadhas, Edeva of the charnel grounds

original: g+ha d+har dur khrod e de bas/_/rjes bzung bod du lan gsum byon/_/
analyzed: g+ha d+har dur khrod e de bas/_/rjes bzung bod du lan gsum byon/_/
translated: took him as his disciple, and he went to Tibet three times.

original: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/_gsang sngags kyi🔽lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i snying po bsdus pa/_slob dpon dpal 'bir ba
analyzed: 'chi med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/_gsang sngags kyi lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i snying po bsdus pa/_slob dpon dpal 'bir ba
translated: The commentary on the attainment of immortality called the “Accomplishment of the Swastika”🔽is the collected essence of the path and result of secret mantra.

original: pas mdzad pa/_rdzogs snyo//_//
analyzed: pas mdzad pa/_rdzogs snyo//_//
translated: It was composed by the master Śrī Abhijna.

original: bla ma chen po dur khrod e de bas rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//_//
analyzed: bla ma chen po dur khrod e de bas rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//_//
translated: It was translated by the great master Edeva of the charnel grounds.

original: med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: med grub pa'i 'grel pa g.yung drung grub pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The commentary on the attainment of immortality called the “Accomplishment of the Swastika”
